statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR username = 'test_user';
DELETE FROM access_controls WHERE user_id = 101 AND resource_id = 201 AND permission_type = 'read';
DELETE FROM access_controls WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'admin');
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 3 AND role_id = 4;
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 1;
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 1;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin');
DELETE FROM resources WHERE resource_id NOT IN (SELECT resource_id FROM user_roles);
DELETE FROM user_role_mapping WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 1;
